metadata.name: Alex Morgan
metadata.bio: For the past 5 years I have specialized in **Product Design for Decentralization**, focusing on transforming complex Web3 architecture (DeFi, Account Abstraction, DDEs) into smooth, high-adoption consumer UX across mobile, web and spatial computing. My career is defined by tackling Web3's hardest challenge - mass adoption. I was the Lead Designer who took Gist (Social-fi) from concept to launch, architecting the unique core iOS experience and the UX vision for Apple Vision Pro, which drove 10,000+ waitlist sign-ups. Simultaneously, I designed the end-to-end workflow for Chaquen (Game-Fi), implementing Account Abstraction to eliminate wallet friction and scale the platform to 18,000+ active users. In Decentralized Finance (DeFi), I built trust for high-stakes environments, redesigning core flows at Sperax (managing over $10.8 Million TVL) and refining yield/governance UX at Vault Craft. Beyond product, I personally build and manage the full design ecosystem, including high-converting waitlist pages and company blogs using Framer and Cursor AI.

caseStudies.title: DeFi Yield Farming Platform
caseStudies.summary: Developed a decentralized yield farming platform with automated strategies, enabling users to optimize their crypto returns with minimal gas fees.
caseStudies.content: Full case study content for DeFi Yield Farming Platform...

caseStudies.title: NFT Marketplace Protocol
caseStudies.summary: Built a gas-efficient NFT marketplace protocol with royalty enforcement and cross-chain compatibility, serving over 10,000 active users.
caseStudies.content: Full case study content for NFT Marketplace Protocol...

caseStudies.title: DAO Governance Platform
caseStudies.summary: Created a comprehensive DAO governance platform with voting mechanisms, proposal systems, and treasury management tools for decentralized organizations.
caseStudies.content: Full case study content for DAO Governance Platform...

caseStudies.title: Cross-Chain Bridge Protocol
caseStudies.summary: Architected a secure cross-chain bridge protocol enabling seamless asset transfers between Ethereum, Polygon, and other EVM-compatible chains.
